A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw Last Jedi  ..It SUCKED!!! So many problems! So many issues ..all bad! All the characters were 1 dimensional and the story was written and executed by a child. Rey is definitely a \"Mary Sue\"\, Fin \,the supposed Stormtrooper Extraordinaire\, is the Cowardly Clown again \, n Luke has learned nothing in all his years of Meditation and Solace.. for shame? The story absolutely insulted all of the characters abilities and left them all looking like unintelligent buffoons!
